title: 윤재웅
content:
서울
자연과학대학
물리학과
교수이다.
경력
(2020. 03 ~ Present)     Associate Professor, Dept. of Physics, Hanyang University.
(2018. 11 ~ 2020. 02)  Senior Researcher, Artificial Intelligence Laboratory, Electronics and Telecommunications Research Institute.
(2015. 04 ~ 2018. 10)  Associate Research Professor, Dept. of Physics, Hanyang University.
(2010. 02 ~ 2015. 01)  Assistant Research Professor, Dept. of Electrical Engineering, University of Texas – Arlington.
(2006. 03 ~ 2011. 12)  Post Doctoral Research Fellow, Dept. of Physics, Hanyang University.
(2002. 03 ~ 2006. 02)  Ph. D. in Physics, Dept. of Physics, Hanyang University.
(2000. 03 ~ 2002. 02)  M.S. in Physics, Dept. of Physics, Hanyang University.
(1995. 04 ~ 1997. 06)  Military Service (telegrapher and sniper), Republic of Korea Army.
(1993. 03 ~ 2000. 02)  B.S. in Physics, Dept. of Physics, Hanyang University.
교내 매체
<뉴스H> 2025.04.25
윤재웅 교수, 위상학적 빛 제어 기술을 세계 최초로 실험 증명하다
